name: Firey And His Favorite Chocolate Bar
name_original: Firey And His Favorite Chocolate Bar
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS SCARY SOUNDS AND DISTRACTING NOICES

Sorry, it's only HTML5 and theres no walk Animations

Story:

it's 2AM, and Firey Just Had an Nightmare, Firey decides to go get his Favorite Chocolate Bar,

the only problem, his chocolate bar is in a vending machine, He will have to find 3 golden coins in all his base, After he eated his Chocolate Bar, he can

go back to Sleep

---

Informations:

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Cursor: Interact and Grab (Note: you can't interact with Doors, Pipes and things in the Underground), the character will have to touch them to interact)

Unlock Steps:

Normal Ending: Get the Chocolate Bar with the Vending Machine

Energy Ending: Find 3 Bubblegums on the floor (they having floor colors)

Death Ending: use an Door in the Underground

Best Ending: Find the Chocolate Bar in the Underground
